description: These simple bubble and squeak cakes are perfect for breakfast or brunch with a fried egg on top.
name: Brussels Sprout Bubble & Squeak Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1kg potatoes, peeled and chopped into cubes

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a drizzle of the oil in a large pan on medium heat and cook the brussels sprouts for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Set aside.
Cook the potatoes in a large pan of salted water for 15-20 minutes, or until tender. Drain well, mash completely, stir in the butter and place back on the heat. Cook for 2 minutes.
Stir the brussels sprouts into the potatoes and add parsley. Spread the flour out on a plate and shape the potato mix into patties. Coat each in flour.

Heat a tablespoon of oil in a large non-stick pan and cook the patties for 2 minutes on each side, until golden, working in batches. Clean out the pan with kitchen paper and heat the remaining oil. Cook the eggs to your liking and serve on top of the bubble and squeak cakes.
